title: Japan’s Takaichi Warns Ready to Act on Speculative Market Moves
description: Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi issued a fresh warning against the financial markets amid rising bond yields and the weakening yen, saying the government will be ready to take action.
content: Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi issued a fresh warning against the financial markets amid rising bond yields and the weakening yen, saying the government will be ready to take action.
